title: Generative AI for Software Development
description: This course provides an in-depth understanding of Generative AI and its applications in software development. Participants will learn to integrate Generative AI tools into the software development process, develop proficiency in using AI programming tools, and explore the impact of Generative AI on the software development lifecycle through practical activities and assessments.

learning_objectives.objective: Understand the fundamentals of Generative AI and its applications in software development.
Learn how to integrate Generative AI tools into the software development process.
Develop proficiency in using AI programming tools for code generation, debugging, and performance enhancement.
Explore the impact of Generative AI on the software development lifecycle.
Gain hands-on experience through practical activities and assessments.

target_audience.audience: Software developers, engineers, and computer science students.

expected_outcome.outcome: Participants will be able to understand and apply Generative AI in various stages of software development.
Proficiency in using AI tools like GPT, GitHub Copilot, for practical applications.
Ability to integrate Generative AI in coding, debugging, and performance enhancement tasks.
Skills in using Generative AI for project management and documentation.
Hands-on experience through real-world projects and assessments.

skill_level.requirements: Basic understanding of software development principles and some experience in coding.
